entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 09 January 2023
